verbose(java.lang.String).Description: Used to log detailed information. This information will probably only be useful during development and debugging.

Parameters: The exception that was thrown that caused the error.
error(java.lang.Exception).Description: Used to log runtime errors or unexpected conditions. These errors will likely result in data not being sent to the GA servers.

Parameters: A string describing the error that occurred.
error(java.lang.String).Description: Used to log runtime errors or unexpected conditions. These errors will likely result in data not being sent to the GA servers.

info(java.lang.String).Description: Used to log information on the flow through the system and other interesting events.

setLogLevel(int).Description: @B_com#google#android#gms#analytics#Logger_E@ is deprecated. Setting log level is ignored.

warn(java.lang.String).Description: Used in situations like use of deprecated APIs, poor use of API, near errors, other runtime situations that are undesirable or unexpected, but not necessarily "wrong".

ClassDesc: Logger interface is deprecated. Use adb shell setprop log.tag.GAv4 DEBUG to enable debug logging for Google Analytics. Deprecated Analytics Logger interface. Google Analytics will log to logcat under @B_android#util#Log_E@ system. By default only ERROR, WARN and INFO levels are enabled.
